markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Two-Weapon Flurry](/Feats.aspx?ID=4846) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 150 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=57) (Level 16), [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=247) (Level 16)

**Requirements**
You are wielding two weapons, each in a different hand

</column>

---

Using the momentum of your prior attack, you lash out with both your weapons in a sudden frenzy. Strike twice, once with each weapon.
name: Two-Weapon Flurry
requirement: You are wielding two weapons, each in a different hand
requirement_markdown: You are wielding two weapons, each in a different hand
